articles.description: Kentucky and Rhode Island have done nearly the same number of coronavirus tests — but with vastly different sized populations. And that makes all the difference.
articles.content:
The difference suggests Rhode Island probably has a better sense of the viruss spread throughout the state, making it better prepared to curb it.
The contrast offers a clear illustration of the challenges posed by a state-by-state testing strategy, in the ab… [+8041 chars]

articles.author: Caroline Kelly and Jen Christensen, CNN
articles.title: CDC chief says there could be second, possibly worse coronavirus outbreak this winter - CNN
articles.description: A second coronavirus outbreak could emerge this winter in conjunction with the flu season to make for an even more dire health crisis, the director of the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention told The Washington Post in an interview.
articles.content:
(CNN)A second coronavirus outbreak could emerge this winter in conjunction with the flu season to make for an even more dire health crisis, the director of the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention told The Washington Post in an interview.
